info.name: Compact Firefox
info.description:
A compact, minimalist and complete theme for Firefox.
Several customization options, including a special lightweight theme. See notes.
info.additionalInfo: 1) For Windows 10 and Firefox 56. 2) Does not work on Firefox 57 and above. 3) It's compatible with lightweight themes (personas), except the pre-installed "Compact Dark" and "Compact Light" themes. To use lightweight themes, set "background color of the bars" to "default". My user styles

data.title: Stylish updated and with new WebExtension. Does not work

options.label: More compact
Less compact
Below navigation bar
Below navigation bar (inverted tabs)
Light blue theme (with tabs on top)
Light blue theme (with tabs on bottom)
Transparent and over the page
Compact scrollbar
Transparent and over the page (9px)
Transparent and over the page (11px)
Transparent and over the page (13px)
On the right (default)
options.value:
#main-window[sizemode="maximized"] #PanelUI-popup .panel-arrow[side="top"] {margin-left: -14px !important; margin-right: 14px !important}
#nav-bar #nav-bar-customization-target #search-container:first-child .searchbar-textbox {margin-left: 0 !important}

options.label: On the left
Hidden
Show only on the active tab
options.value:
.tabbrowser-tab .tab-close-button {display: none !important}
.tabbrowser-tab:not([pinned]):not([protected="true"])[selected="true"] .tab-close-button {display: -moz-box !important}

options.label: Show only on the hovered tab
options.value:
.tabbrowser-tab .tab-close-button {display: none !important}
.tabbrowser-tab:not([pinned]):not([protected="true"]):hover .tab-close-button {display: -moz-box !important}

options.label: Combine tab icon and tab close button
On the tab bar (default)
options.value:
.private-browsing-indicator {width: 28px !important}
#main-window:not([tabsintitlebar]) .private-browsing-indicator {background-image: url("chrome://browser/skin/privatebrowsing-mask-titlebar.png") !important; background-position: center 0 !important}

options.label: On the navigation bar
options.value:
.private-browsing-indicator {display: none !important}
#main-window[privatebrowsingmode] #nav-bar:after {content: url("chrome://browser/skin/privatebrowsing-mask-titlebar.png") !important; float: right !important; margin-top: 2px !important; margin-bottom: -2px !important; margin-right: 2px !important; -moz-transform: scaleY(1.1) !important}

options.label: Hidden
options.value: .private-browsing-indicator {display: none !important}

options.label: Visible
Visible
options.value: .addon-view .date-updated {display: -moz-box !important}

settings.label: Details button position on add-ons page

options.label: On the right
